description.value:
Whenever you take a move action to Stride, you can attempt a @Check[acrobatics|dc:15] check to roll forward.

Critical Success You gain 5 extra feet of movement to your Speeds and can move through solid obstacles such as walls until the end of your Stride action.

Success You gain 5 extra feet of movement to your Speeds until the end of your Stride action.

Failure You lose 5 feet of movement from your Speeds until the end of your Stride action.

Critical Failure Your character softlocks and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Paralyzed] permanently. Only a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wish] ritual or similar magic can reverse this effect.

publication.title: Paizo Blog: Foolish Housekeeping and Other Articles
